CustomField.description: When checked, this message will not be included in the conversation history sent to the LLM for future turns. Useful for system messages or debugging content that shouldn't influence the AI's responses.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this to prevent the message from being sent to the AI in future conversation turns. Use for system messages or content that shouldn't influence the AI's responses.
CustomField.label: Exclude From LLM History
